akka.io

Interface Inet.SocketOption

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Inet.SocketOptionV2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Inet.AbstractSocketOption, Inet.AbstractSocketOptionV2, Inet.DatagramChannelCreator, Tcp.SO$.KeepAlive, Tcp.SO$.OOBInline, Tcp.SO$.TcpNoDelay, Udp.SO$.Broadcast
    Enclosing class:
    Inet

    public static interface Inet.SocketOption
    SocketOption is a package of data (from the user) and associated behavior (how to apply that to a channel).
